about_the_game:
=============================================
!! Currently, it is only played in desktop mode on Steam Deck. !!
=============================================

It is a top-view shooting genre game based on the worldview of "Battle Titan Moohun"(1991)
a mechanical genre novel serialized in a Korean hobby magazine in 1991.

It is a martial arts world-view mechanical shooting game inspired by the
masterpiece shooting game Thunder Force(テクノソフト) & MUSHA-Alester.(コンパイル)

The protagonist travels with the Battle titan "RAINBOW" while protecting cargo ships carrying merchants traveling on dangerous trade routes.

As a retro mechanical shooting game based on pixel art, it is a game that has growth factors
such as Action RPG and destroys powerful enemies with the support of various equipment and allies.

#>Game Features
- Top View 2D Shooting Game (shoot'em up)
- Japanese Robot Animation Style Artwork
- Easy play, difficult master
- martial arts style story
- 6 ++ Game Stage Battle !!
- Level-UP, Equipment, Skill UP!, RPG System

------------ B type Demo 1.2.1.13 --------

-- This is the second version of the demo for Battle Titan RAINBOW --
This version of the demo has been improved both in terms of systems and content.
We recommend playing with a Game Pad rather than a keyboard.

>Contents
+Experience the prologue stage of the scenario.
+Arcade time attack for 2 x stages.
+Aircraft customization system exclusive to the arcade mode.
+Addition of various enemies.
+Addition of various attack patterns.
+UI / UX enhancements.

Posted a brief summary of the game world of "Battle Titan: Moo-hun."
detailed_description:
=============================================
!! Currently, it is only played in desktop mode on Steam Deck. !!
=============================================

It is a top-view shooting genre game based on the worldview of "Battle Titan Moohun"(1991)
a mechanical genre novel serialized in a Korean hobby magazine in 1991.

It is a martial arts world-view mechanical shooting game inspired by the
masterpiece shooting game Thunder Force(テクノソフト) & MUSHA-Alester.(コンパイル)

The protagonist travels with the Battle titan "RAINBOW" while protecting cargo ships carrying merchants traveling on dangerous trade routes.

As a retro mechanical shooting game based on pixel art, it is a game that has growth factors
such as Action RPG and destroys powerful enemies with the support of various equipment and allies.

#>Game Features
- Top View 2D Shooting Game (shoot'em up)
- Japanese Robot Animation Style Artwork
- Easy play, difficult master
- martial arts style story
- 6 ++ Game Stage Battle !!
- Level-UP, Equipment, Skill UP!, RPG System

------------ B type Demo 1.2.1.13 --------

-- This is the second version of the demo for Battle Titan RAINBOW --
This version of the demo has been improved both in terms of systems and content.
We recommend playing with a Game Pad rather than a keyboard.

>Contents
+Experience the prologue stage of the scenario.
+Arcade time attack for 2 x stages.
+Aircraft customization system exclusive to the arcade mode.
+Addition of various enemies.
+Addition of various attack patterns.
+UI / UX enhancements.

Posted a brief summary of the game world of "Battle Titan: Moo-hun."

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: A nVidia or AMD graphics card with latest drivers, at least 512 MB of dedicated video memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: A nVidia or AMD graphics card with latest drivers, at least 512 MB of dedicated video memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
